name: Patagonia Quandary 10" Shorts - Men's
description: On the trail, on your bike, on the street – these light, tough shorts are everything you need for summer action. The breathable stretch fabric moves with you, so things are always good.Made of recycled nylon with spandex for stretch. DWR finish sheds guacamole and other spills.Curved waistband  follows the natural shape of the hips and provides a contoured fit.Gusseted crotch supports a wide range of motion.Zip fly with metal button closure and belt loops.2 front slash pockets with mesh pocket bags for ventilation.
